0.text: DETECTION RADIUS: 700

Innate: Evelynn shrouds herself in Demon Shade after not performing actions that break stealth for 4 seconds. Attacking or casting abilities ends Demon Shade immediately and places it on a 4-second static cooldown, reduced to 1.25 seconds from casting  Last Caress. Taking damage from  champions or  turrets interrupts Demon Shade and places it on a 1.5-second static cooldown.
0.html: Innate: Evelynn shrouds herself in Demon Shade after not performing actions that break stealth for 4 seconds. Attacking or casting abilities ends Demon Shade immediately and places it on a 4-second static cooldown, reduced to 1.25 seconds from casting Last Caress. Taking damage from champions or turrets interrupts Demon Shade and places it on a 1.5-second static cooldown.
markedPassages: Last Caress
champions
turrets

1.text: Demon Shade: While below  250 − 590 (based on level) (+ 250% AP) health, Evelynn  heals herself for 15 − 150 (based on level) every second. From level 6 onward, Demon Shade also grants  camouflage.
1.html: Demon Shade: While below  250 − 590 (based on level) (+ 250% AP) health, Evelynn heals herself for 15 − 150 (based on level) every second. From level 6 onward, Demon Shade also grants camouflage.

0.text: 250 − 590 (based on level)

1.text: 15 − 150 (based on level)

heals
camouflage

1.text: COOLDOWN: 4

0.text: Active: Evelynn launches a dart in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and marking them for 4 seconds.
0.html: Active: Evelynn launches a dart in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and marking them for 4 seconds.

1.text: Evelynn's next 3 basic attacks or abilities against the marked target deal bonus magic damage.
1.html: Evelynn's next 3 basic attacks or abilities against the marked target deal bonus magic damage.

2.text: Hate Spike may be recast up to 3 times at no cost until the ability comes off cooldown.
2.html: Hate Spike may be recast up to 3 times at no cost until the ability comes off cooldown.

3.text: Recast: Evelynn unleashes a line of deadly spikes in the direction of the nearest  visible enemy that deals magic damage to all enemies struck.
3.html: Recast: Evelynn unleashes a line of deadly spikes in the direction of the nearest visible enemy that deals magic damage to all enemies struck.
markedPassages: visible

4.text: Hate Spike's recast prioritizes targeting Evelynn's attack target, then the nearest enemy champion, then the nearest non-champion.
4.html: Hate Spike's recast prioritizes targeting Evelynn's attack target, then the nearest enemy champion, then the nearest non-champion.

5.text: A nearby  visible enemy is required to recast this ability.
5.html: A nearby visible enemy is required to recast this ability.
markedPassages: visible
possibleConcerningAbilities: A nearby  visible enemy is required to recast this ability.

0.text: Active: Evelynn curses the target enemy  champion or  monster for 5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Evelynn curses the target enemy champion or monster for 5 seconds.
markedPassages: champion
monster

1.text: Evelynn's next basic attack or ability against the accursed target expunges them,  slowing them by 65% for 0.75 seconds.
1.html: Evelynn's next basic attack or ability against the accursed target expunges them, slowing them by 65% for 0.75 seconds.
markedPassages: slowing

2.text: Expunging a target will refund Allure's  mana cost. If the target is cursed for at least 2.5 seconds, the expunge also  charms them for a few seconds and the duration of the  slow is increased to last for this time, as well as applying additional effects based on the target type.
2.html: Expunging a target will refund Allure's  mana cost. If the target is cursed for at least 2.5 seconds, the expunge also charms them for a few seconds and the duration of the slow is increased to last for this time, as well as applying additional effects based on the target type.
markedPassages: mana cost
mana cost
charms
slow

3.text: Against champions, the expunge also inflicts  magic resistance reduction for 4 seconds.Against monsters, the expunge deals bonus magic damage and the  charm lasts 2 seconds longer.

Against champions, the expunge also inflicts  magic resistance reduction for 4 seconds.
Against monsters, the expunge deals bonus magic damage and the charm lasts 2 seconds longer.

charm

skillTabs.concerningText: Expunging a target will refund Allure's  mana cost. If the target is cursed for at least 2.5 seconds, the expunge also  charms them for a few seconds and the duration of the  slow is increased to last for this time, as well as applying additional effects based on the target type.

Expunging a target will refund Allure's  mana cost. If the target is cursed for at least 2.5 seconds, the expunge also  charms them for a few seconds and the duration of the  slow is increased to last for this time, as well as applying additional effects based on the target type.

textContent.text: Against champions, the expunge also inflicts  magic resistance reduction for 4 seconds.Against monsters, the expunge deals bonus magic damage and the  charm lasts 2 seconds longer.
textContent.html:
Against champions, the expunge also inflicts  magic resistance reduction for 4 seconds.
Against monsters, the expunge deals bonus magic damage and the charm lasts 2 seconds longer.

skillTabs.concerningText: Against champions, the expunge also inflicts  magic resistance reduction for 4 seconds.Against monsters, the expunge deals bonus magic damage and the  charm lasts 2 seconds longer.
Against champions, the expunge also inflicts  magic resistance reduction for 4 seconds.Against monsters, the expunge deals bonus magic damage and the  charm lasts 2 seconds longer.

textContent.text: Casting Allure does not break  Demon Shade nor its fade into it.
textContent.html: Casting Allure does not break Demon Shade nor its fade into it.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Casting Allure does not break  Demon Shade nor its fade into it.

concerningSkills.skillName: casting allure does not break demon shade nor its fade into it.

textContent.text: Active: Evelynn whips the target enemy with her lashers, dealing magic damage and applying  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
textContent.html: Active: Evelynn whips the target enemy with her lashers, dealing magic damage and applying on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Evelynn whips the target enemy with her lashers, dealing magic damage and applying  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

markedPassages: (+ 3% (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

textContent.text: Evelynn also gains  30% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
textContent.html: Evelynn also gains  30% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

textContent.text: Gaining  Demon Shade resets Whiplash's  cooldown and  empowers its next cast. The damage based on the target's health ratio for both Whiplash and its  empowered cast deals a minimum of 25 and is capped at 450 against  monsters.
textContent.html: Gaining Demon Shade resets Whiplash's  cooldown and empowers its next cast. The damage based on the target's health ratio for both Whiplash and its empowered cast deals a minimum of 25 and is capped at 450 against monsters.

textContent.text: Active: Evelynn  dashes toward the target enemy with her lashers, dealing  increased damage to them upon completion as well as to all enemies within her path.
textContent.html: Active: Evelynn dashes toward the target enemy with her lashers, dealing increased damage to them upon completion as well as to all enemies within her path.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Evelynn  dashes toward the target enemy with her lashers, dealing  increased damage to them upon completion as well as to all enemies within her path.

markedPassages: (+ 4% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

textContent.text: Empowered Whiplash only applies  on-hit effects to the primary target.
textContent.html: Empowered Whiplash only applies on-hit effects to the primary target.

textContent.text: Active: Evelynn reveals her true form, becoming  untargetable at the start of the cast time and then unleashing her lashers in a cone in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies struck within. After 0.5 seconds, she  blinks 700 units in the opposite direction and becomes targetable again.
textContent.html: Active: Evelynn reveals her true form, becoming untargetable at the start of the cast time and then unleashing her lashers in a cone in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies struck within. After 0.5 seconds, she blinks 700 units in the opposite direction and becomes targetable again.

After 0.5 seconds, she  blinks 700 units in the opposite direction and becomes targetable again.

blinks

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Supersonic: Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage to enemies hit. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while facing nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
active.originText:
UNIQUE – SUPERSONIC:  Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage to enemies hit. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while facing nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Glory: Gain 4 stacks for each champion kill and 2 stacks for each assist, up to a maximum of 25 stacks. Lose 10 stacks on death. Stacks are preserved from Dark Seal.
Unique – Dread: Gain 5 ability power for each stack of Glory, up to 125 at maximum stacks, and 10% bonus movement speed if you have at least 10 stacks.
